mapper.insert: insert into tp_user( tp_uname, tp_uemail, tp_upwd, tp_regdate )values ( #{uname}, #{uemail}, #{upwd}, #{regDate} )

FROM tp_user
or tp_uid = #{uid}
or tp_uname LIKE concat('%', #{uname}, '%')
